oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Scottish Agricultural College (SAC): Animal research facilities
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Animal husbandry
Health and welfare
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Purpose-built animal housing for cattle and sheep. Currently buildings, fields and post mortem room facility are approved for animal use research purposes (Animals (Scientific Procedures) Act). Complete range of veterinary pathology services.
oai_dc:dc.dc:identifier: {Facility} SAC: Scottish Agricultural College (SAC): Animal research facilities. Facility Leader(s): Gray, Douglas.
